column2: IU International University of Applied Sciences
column3: IU International University of Applied Sciences
column5: IU’s master’s in industrial and organizational psychology programme empowers you with the knowledge and skills to understand and optimise human behaviour in the workplace. Through a comprehensive curriculum, you will delve into the intricacies of organisational structures, employee motivation, leadership, and team dynamics. This programme equips you with practical tools and theoretical frameworks to analyse and solve real-world challenges in various industries. You will explore topics such as talent acquisition and management, organisational development, and workplace diversity. With a focus on evidence-based practices, you will learn to design and implement interventions that enhance employee well-being, job satisfaction, and overall organisational performance.
column7: Starting from € 214 (£ 183)* per month *based on the exchange rate from 15.06.2023 09:05 AM (CEST)
